scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules packages/bird-tracker/node_modules packages/subscription-master/node_modules bun.lockb packages/bird-tracker/bun.lockb packages/subscription-master/bun.lockb
scripts.depcruise:svg: mkdir -p depcruise && for pkg in packages/*/; do name=$(basename "$pkg"); (cd "$pkg" && npx depcruise src --include-only "^src" --output-type dot | dot -T svg > "../../depcruise/$name.svg"); done && echo 'Reports saved to depcruise/'
